content: --रस {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (नीरस) {1} tasteless, unsavoury, flavourless. {2} (<ab>fig.</ab>) insipid, without any poetic charm; नीरसानां पद्यानां <ls>S. D. 1.</ls> {3} sapless, without juice, withered or dried up; <ls>Ś. Til. 9.</ls> {4} vain, useless, fruitless; अलब्धफलनीरसान् मम विधाय तस्मिन् जने <ls>V. 2. 11.</ls> {5} disagreeable. {6} cruel, merciless. (--सः the pomegranate.
